      • addParseTimeDeps

        public void addParseTimeDeps(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableCollection.Builder<BuildTarget> targetGraphOnlyDepsBuilder,
                             @Nullable
                             JvmLibraryArg args,
                             TargetConfiguration toolchainTargetConfiguration)
        Adds the parse time deps required for javac based on the args. If the args has a spec for javac, we assume that the parse time deps will be derived elsewhere.
